name: Multi Gather Skype User Data Enumeration
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
description:
This module will enumerate Skype account settings, contact list, call history, chat logs,
          file transfer history, and voicemail logs, saving all the data to CSV files for analysis.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Timeout in seconds when downloading main.db on a shell session.
